title: Has the ozone layer recovered? - Quora

response.answer_text: The ozone layer is recreated every spring as the suns power increases to make ozone, and is at its least active in winter due losing solar power with ozone creating ultra violet being at its lowest. I suspect it was used by manufacturers of refrigerants( EG DUPONT) as an excuse to stop others using their patented gas whose patent was running out. Ozone is a very unstable gas and the hole may have been there all the time expanding and contracting with solar power as the seasons change. My opinion is shared by many.

As the use of cfcs have significantly reduced as many governments have banned the use of cfcs in their countries and instead are using other compounds as refrigerants , the amount of ozone layer depletion has decresed . Yet , it still remains to continue to flourish because of the greenhouse gases , i.e CO , carbon dioxide , methane etc. It CAN be stopped by reducing pollution and planting more trees .

These vents close when the garbage has been “flushed”. Rather than admitting their error the “scientists” simply went silent. This really should piss everyone in the world off. It is the common “scientific” myth that ozone forms a barrier to harmful UV rays from the sun, but this is also BULLSHIT. The ozone barrier keeps earth’s atmosphere from escaping into space.
